name: What Happened At The Cabin
description:
For Matt Asplands Summer game jam

My parents recently told me that people used to break into our family cabin and do satanic rituals. I thought "hmm rad"  Thanks for coming by!

PRESS [M] for map in game, forgot that!

Hint: You have to read notes in cabin

Anyone make it past the spiders ?

I'm going to update game after game jam. I really think I could have fun turning this into a full game
